faq-one-title: Can I customize my cricket bat?
faq-one-content: Yes, we provide bat customization options to our customers. You can design your own bat with Heega Sports. Heega’s Customized Cricket Bat is perfect for cricketers who are strictly selective and do not compromise when it comes to their bat’s weight, shape, and design. Customization is available based on Willow grade, handle shape, toe shape, sweet spot position, bat’s weight, handle length, and blade length. Our bats are made of genuine quality English Willow and Kashmir Willow. Heega bats are specially designed to make you stand out from others.
